about_the_game:
A series of creatures have invaded the Galiant Lands and going out at night is no longer an option.

You are The Huntress, and your mission is to eliminate these creatures before it's too late.

You were cursed and blessed with the powers of Blaze and Gloom, granted by your Scythe, you must confront these creatures that dwell in the shadows. Explore the floating islands and challenge anyone who stands in your hunt, unleash your power and emerge victorious.

Duality Battle Zones:

  • Enemies with two forms, depending on whether they are in light or darkness.
  • They have different behavior according to their shape.
  • Lure your prey to force them to transform to your will.

The World

  • World set in Celtiberian and Galician culture.
  • A world full of color and nature.

Key Features:

  • Side-scrolling with three-dimensional action.
  • Dodge, run, and strike to make your way even against the deadliest adversaries.
  • Explore the Galiant Lands in search of a worthy prey.
  • Use the light and embrace the darkness! Use your scythe's blessings and curses to become more powerful and hunt bigger beasts.
  • Beautiful landscapes with various environments to explore

You’ll love this game if you:

  • Like Action-Platform Games..
  • Like Fast-Paced combat and fluid movement.
  • Love indie games with a classical approach.
